atst.giss.abplc

Class ABPlcioMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • atst.giss.abplc.ABPlcioMaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IABPlcioMaster

    public class ABPlcioMaster
extends java.lang.Object
implements IABPlcioMaster
    ABPlcioMaster is the class that handles all Allen-Bradley PLC communication using the PLCIO C library. Access to PLCIO is made using JNI method calls.

    The master NEEDS to be constructed in the container's namespace because it uses JNI code. Connections MUST load it via a call to: Misc#getSharedObject(String) and then cast the returned object into an IABPlcioMaster. The interface MUST be used because the object is used across different namespaces.

    Developed from atst.base.hardware.connections.example.FooMuxMaster by John Hubbard.

    • Method Detail

      • plc_readCallback

        public static int plc_readCallback(int connNumber,
                                   java.lang.String connName,
                                   java.lang.String tagName,
                                   int bytesReadTotal,
                                   byte[] tagBytes,
                                   int readTagKeyID)
        Callback method called from JNI PLCIO C to return to Java tag values read from the PLC following call to JNI plc_read().
        Parameters:
        connNumber - -- the connection number
        connName - -- the connection name
        tagName - -- the tag to read
        bytesReadTotal - -- the number of bytes to read
        tagBytes - -- the array to put the read bytes into
        readTagKeyID - -- the tag key id
        Returns:
        0 if the read is successful, 1 if the read fails

      • plc_validaddrCallback

        public static void plc_validaddrCallback(int connectionNumber,
                                         java.lang.String connName,
                                         java.lang.String tagName,
                                         int tagSize,
                                         int tagDomain,
                                         int tagOffset)
        Callback method called from JNI PLCIO C to return to Java tag validation read from the PLC following call to JNI plc_validaddr().
        Parameters:
        connectionNumber - -- the connection number
        connName - -- the name of the connection
        tagName - -- the tag to validate
        tagSize - -- the size of the tag
        tagDomain - -- the domain of the tag
        tagOffset - -- the offset of the tag

      • plcAccess

        public void plcAccess(IPlcioCall plcioCall)
               throws ABPlcioExceptionPLCIO,
                      ABPlcioExceptionJNI,
                      ConnectionException
        The PLC access method through which all access is made to the PLC.

        It forwards the call to the real Master's ABPlcioMaster.RealABPlcioMaster.realAccessPlc(IPlcioCall).

        Specified by:
        plcAccess in interface IABPlcioMaster
        Parameters:
        plcioCall - An IPlcioCall object describing the PLC access required and including any necessary parameters for the call.
        Throws:
        ABPlcioExceptionPLCIO - -- ABPlcioExceptionPLCIO
        ABPlcioExceptionJNI - -- ABPlcioExceptionJNI
        ConnectionException - -- ConnectionException
